title: Instagram Feeds
description: Create an attractive Instagram feed, the goal is to create a harmonious and planned visual appearance through choosing the right theme, color palette and design style. In addition, this project also includes content planning to ensure the feed is always active and relevant, taking into account aesthetic aspects and audience engagement.
